alert.note: Alert for Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 3:26AM MST until November 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 inches, except 2 to 4 inches in the foothills. * WHERE...Upper Treasure Valley zone east of Boise. * WHEN...From 5 AM early this morning to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Use caution and give plenty of extra time if traveling on the I-84 corridor during the Thanksgiving holiday. For additional safety information, please visit www.weather.gov/safety/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
